description:
WuTility helps you manage your W&T network devices

Management and inventorying tool for W&T network devices.
Active search for Web-IO devices, USB Servers, Com-Servers and other
W&T network components in the local subnet, display of all important
information at a glance.
Additional functions are initial assignment of IP addresses, copying
of entire configuration blocks, uploading of firmware updates as well
as direct telnet and browser access.
